}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:03.519

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:19.599
    | text      = When you start to get into what motivated Dorner, a very complicated picture becomes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:23.759
    | text      = to emerge.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:25.039
    | text      = Dorner had previously been an officer with the LAPD, but he was fired in January 2009
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:29.839
    | text      = after he claimed a fellow officer had kicked a homeless man who they were detaining.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:34.079
    | text      = Dorner was a rookie, and so he had to go along with a training officer, in this case, a woman

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = named Theresa Evans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:40.240
    | text      = When they arrived on a call, they approached Christopher Gettler, who suffered from severe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.640
    | text      = mental illness.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:46.000
    | text      = Gettler threw a punch, and then he was tasered by Evans, and he ended up being the first
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:53.039
    | text      = being detained and then released to his father's custody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:56.720
    | text      = Two weeks later, Dorner reported Evans to his sergeant, saying she had kicked Gettler
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:00.440
    | text      = in the chest and face, drawing blood in an instance of clear, excessive force.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:05.759
    | text      = An internal investigation did not conclude that that kicking had happened, and Dorner
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:29:09.960
    | text      = was fired for filing a false report against Evans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:13.039
    | text      = That sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:14.039
    | text      = After he was fired, Dorner requested the termination be reviewed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:17.539
    | text      = That prompted hearings with the Office of the Inspector General, then the L.A. Superior
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:21.279
    | text      = Court, and eventually the California Court of Appeals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:24.240
    | text      = All of them upheld this termination and found no wrongdoing on the part of the LAPD.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:28.920
    | text      = However, when you start to get into the details surrounding the case, there's a bit of muddiness
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:33.740
    | text      = that a lot of people have a very difficult time wrestling with.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
